chargeHist.descr: Money Laundering-Knowingly Conducts Unlawful Transaction (over $10,000 to $100,000)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Karen M Schoenung in court.  Attorney Jonathan Carver Smith in court for Karen M Schoenung.  Attorney Nicolas J Heitman in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a scheduling conference.  Defense acknowledges receipt of an offer and requests additional time to review offer with client.  Court scheduled a status conference.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Karen M Schoenung in court.  Attorney Jonathan Carver Smith in court for Karen M Schoenung.  Prosecuting attorney Nicolas J Heitman in court for the State of Wisconsin. Scheduling conference held. Defense is reviewing discovery and is requesting an additional scheduling date. Case is adjourned in Branch 02.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
order freezing and seizing assets signed and filed.

Defendant Karen M Schoenung in court with Attorney Jonathan Carver Smith.  Nicolas Heitman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 02, Judge Childs. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
signed, Order on Substitution of Counsel
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 5:00 P.M. ON 07-23-2022. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR, A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Karen M Schoenung in court with attorney Jamie J Pagac.  Matthew Richard Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 2.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Petition to Freeze Assets, filed by the State
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 07/21/2022@2:30p
